ProductRequest.name: ProductRequest
ProductRequest.description: Represents a request or an order for products to and from specific inventory locations.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the product request.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the product request. For example, this may be the case because of which the product is requested.

Description.description: The description of the product request.

DestinationLocationId.description: The location where the product is delivered.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isn’t null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

NeedByDate.description: The date by which the product must be delivered to fulfill the request.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product request.

ProductRequestNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the product request.

ShipToAddress.description: The address that the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToCity.description: The city that the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToCountry.description: The country that the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToGeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy of the geocode for the shipping address.

ShipToLatitude.description: The latitude of the location where the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToLongitude.description: The longitude of the location where the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToPostalCode.description: The postal code of the address where the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToState.description: The name of the state where the product is to be delivered to.

ShipToStreet.description: The street address where the product is to be delivered to.

ShipmentType.description: The type of shipment. The picklist includes the following values by default: None Rush Overnight Next Business Day Pick Up

SourceLocationId.description: The location from which the product is shipped.

Status.description: The status of the product transfer.

WorkOrderId.description: The work order that’s associated with the product request.

WorkOrderLineItemId.description: The work order line item that’s associated with the product request.
